io.netty.channel

Interface ChannelOutboundMessageHandler<I>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the message type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Base64Encoder, ByteArrayEncoder, ByteToMessageCodec, ChannelOutboundMessageHandlerAdapter, ChunkedWriteHandler, CompatibleMarshallingEncoder, CompatibleObjectEncoder, HttpClientCodec, HttpContentCompressor, HttpContentEncoder, HttpObjectEncoder, HttpRequestEncoder, HttpResponseEncoder, HttpServerCodec, LengthFieldPrepender, MarshallingEncoder, MessageLoggingHandler, MessageToByteEncoder, MessageToMessageCodec, MessageToMessageEncoder, ObjectEncoder, ProtobufEncoder, ProtobufVarint32LengthFieldPrepender, RtspObjectEncoder, RtspRequestEncoder, RtspResponseEncoder, SocksMessageEncoder, SpdyFrameCodec, SpdyFrameEncoder, SpdyHttpCodec, SpdyHttpEncoder, SpdyHttpResponseStreamIdHandler, SpdySessionHandler, StringEncoder, WebSocket00FrameEncoder, WebSocket07FrameEncoder, WebSocket08FrameEncoder, WebSocket13FrameEncoder

    public interface ChannelOutboundMessageHandler<I>
    ChannelOutboundHandler implementation which operates on messages of a specific type by pass them in a MessageBuf and consume then from there.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

        ChannelHandler.Sharable

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void freeOutboundBuffer(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      Invoked when this handler is not allowed to send any outbound message anymore and thus it's safe to deallocate its outbound buffer.
      MessageBuf<I> newOutboundBuffer(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      Return the Buf which will be used for outbound data for the given ChannelHandlerContext.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelOperationHandler

        bind, close, connect, deregister, disconnect, flush, read, sendFile

      • Methods inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

        afterAdd, afterRemove, beforeAdd, beforeRemove, exceptionCaught, userEventTriggered
